full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG SHAMBHA LAR 'PHO BA SKAL LDAN MYUR 'DREN PHYOGS MTHUN SMON LAM DRI MED BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES BYANG SHAMBHA LAR 'PHO BA'I MAN NGAG SKAL LDAN MYUR 'DREN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SEMS DPA' SPRUL SKU DANG, ,PAN CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RNAMS LAS DUS 'KHOR GYI RNAM SPRUL DU LUNG BSTAN CING, ,RANG NYID LA'ANG DAD LDAN RNAMS SHAMBHA LAR 'KHRID @008B NUS PA'I SNANG BA CUNG ZAD YOD PA, SHI RAL THU MKHAS BTZUN BLO GROS BZANG PO'I 'PHRAL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
